• icon(*.ico)
• Mainfest(*.mainfest)
• Certificate(*.pfx *.p12)

check_log_for_error_details: Check the log for more details.
disable_windowed_traceback_desc: Disables exception tracing in GUI applications to prevent error traceback windows from showing to the end user.
uac_admin_desc: Grants the resulting application administrator privileges when run through the UAC system.
uac_uiaccess_desc: Allows the application to interact with user interface elements in higher security contexts (UIAccess), useful for applications that need access to system elements or elevated windows.
no_upx_desc: Prevents the executable files from being compressed by UPX. Useful to avoid compatibility issues or when digital signing is required.
strip_desc: Removes symbol and debug information from the executable to reduce size, which may make debugging more difficult.
bootloader_signals_desc: Allows the bootloader to handle system signals (such as termination) to enable clean shutdown or cleanup when receiving external signals.
plugins_info: Plugins system is enabled. Place plugin files in the 'plugins' folder
templates_info: You can choose a template from the dropdown menu in the advanced tab

about_program_text:
From Python To Executable v3.1.0

The most powerful tool to convert Python programs to executable files.
Developed by Mohammed Al-Baqer.

Features:
• Convert Python files to EXE
• Support single and batch builds
• Automatic dependency analysis
• Advanced security options
• Extensible plugin system
• Advanced user interface
• Detailed build reports

Terms:
• For personal and commercial use
• Prohibited to use for harmful purposes
• Please respect intellectual property rights.
privacy_policy_text:
• I respect your privacy, the program works locally only inside your device.
• No data is collected or stored outside the user's device.
• All resulting processes are stored locally and remain under your full control.
• By using the program, you acknowledge that it does not share any data.
• Your data is always stored inside your device with complete and guaranteed security.
terms_of_use_text:
• The program is allowed for personal or educational purposes only.
• Modification is allowed provided that developer rights are mentioned when publishing.
• Your use of the program means your full agreement to these terms.
license_agreement_text:
• This program is licensed for personal and non-commercial use.
• Selling the program is not allowed as it is completely free from the developer.
• All rights reserved © 2025.
code_of_conduct_text:
• Users are expected to respect the program and avoid misusing it absolutely.
• Actions that disrupt the system or violate the rights of others are prohibited.
• Using the program means committing to responsible behavior and permanent respect.
contribution_policy_text:
• We always welcome contributions and feedback from other users and developers.
• Suggestions must be constructive, respectful and free of any harm.
• By using the program, you agree to modify contributions to improve overall performance.
